custominstalldescriptiontext.text: Allows you to customize your installation components

arpdescriptiontext.text: You can add or remove additional features at any time after setup via Programs and Features in the Control Panel.

uninstallprompttext.text: The product will be removed from the computer. Do you want to continue?

updateuninstallprompttext.text: This update will be removed from the computer. Do you want to continue?

requiredfeaturesdescriptiontext.text: Select at least one option to continue:

installpathsubheader.text: This installation requires up to 15 GB across all drives

updateslatestsubheader.text: Includes access to all the latest platform versions and updates as well as future updates for the Visual Studio core.

updatesrtmsubheader.text: Visual Studio without any updates applied. This may limit the platforms that are available for you to use.

optionalitemwarning.text: By modifying the default selections, you may experience missing emulators, build errors, and other incompatibilities.

conflictdialogmessage.text: The choice you just clicked conflicts with a previous selection. Do you want to cancel current selection?

termsinstalltext.text: By clicking "Install" you agree to the license terms of the software and components you have selected to install. You are responsible for reading and accepting these license terms. Microsoft grants you no rights for any third party software you have selected; it is provided by the third parties indicated in the applicable license terms.

termsupdatetext.text: By clicking "Update" you agree to the license terms of the software and components you have selected to install. You are responsible for reading and accepting these license terms. Microsoft grants you no rights for any third party software you have selected; it is provided by the third parties indicated in the applicable license terms.

newinstallprogressbarlabel.text: We're installing Visual Studio for you...

msibusytext.text: Another Installation is in progress. Please wait to retry again...

updatingrelatedproducts.text: Configuring your system. This might take a while.

waitfordownloadcompletetext.text: Waiting for acquisition to complete before reboot request...

successinstallsubheader.text: All specified components have been installed successfully.

successrepairsubheader.text: All specified components have been repaired successfully.

successuninstallsubheader.text: All specified components have been uninstalled successfully.

successmodifiedsubheader.text: All specified components have been modified successfully.

successacquiredsubheader.text: All specified components have been acquired successfully.

successrequiredsubheader.text: All required components have been installed successfully.

successwithwarningssubheader.text: However, not all features installed correctly.

warningstext.text: Please correct the following problems to ensure full product functionality. To learn more, you can review the list of !$!http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=[[SolutionFwlinkId]]&clcid=[[clcid]]!,!common issues and workarounds!@! or examine the !$![[LogFilePath]]!,!log file!@!.

failedsubheader.text: Install cannot continue because some required components failed.

failedtext.text: Please correct the following problems and restart the setup to ensure full product functionality. To learn more, you can review the list of !$!http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=[[SolutionFwlinkId]]&clcid=[[clcid]]!,!common issues and workarounds!@! or examine the !$![[LogFilePath]]!,!log file!@!.

progressrebootheader.text: Restart required in order to complete setup.

progressreboottext.text: The computer needs to be restarted before setup can continue. Restart the computer and setup will resume when you next log in.

rebootsuccessreboottext.text: The computer needs to be restarted before starting the product.

rebootfailurereboottext.text: The computer requires a restart. Before restarting setup, restart the computer now or defer until later.

rebootlaterbutton.tooltiptext: Restart later at time of your choosing

defaultmessagesectionheading.text: Please go through the following messages

setupupdateprocessfailure.text: Failed to download and launch Update. Please ensure you have network connection and retry setup.

thirdpartysuccessheader.text: Visual Studio install has completed successfully.

successdetails.text: If you installed features for Cross Platform Mobile Development, working with those projects will require additional software which you can install now or at a later time from Programs and Features in Control Panel. An Internet connection is needed.

successrebootneededheader.text: Visual Studio install has completed successfully and requires a reboot.

successrebootneededdetails.text: If you installed features for Cross Platform Mobile Development, working with those projects will require additional software which you can install after a reboot now or at a later time from Programs and Features in Control Panel. An Internet connection is needed.

warningheader.text: Visual Studio install has completed but not all features are installed correctly.

warningdetails.text: If you installed features for Cross Platform Mobile Development, working with those projects will require additional software which you can install now or at a later time from Programs and Features in Control Panel. An Internet connection is needed. If you choose to install later, you can skip to view warnings.

warningrebootneededheader.text: Visual Studio install has completed but not all features are installed correctly and it requires a reboot.

warningrebootneededdetails.text: If you installed features for Cross Platform Mobile Development, working with those projects will require additional software which you can install after a reboot now or at a later time from Programs and Features in Control Panel. An Internet connection is needed. If you choose to install later, you can skip to view warnings.

installlatesttext.text: Includes access to all the latest platform versions and updates as well as feature updates for the Visual Studio core.

installcurrenttext.text: Visual Studio without any updates applied. This may limit the platforms that are available for you to use.

dialogheader.text: Setup detected an issue during the operation. Please click below to check for a solution and help us to improve the setup experience

selectableitems.selectableitem: Visual Studio core
Visual Studio core.
Visual C++ Mobile Development
Core Tools for Visual C++ Mobile Development.
Multi-Device Hybrid Apps using C#
Multi-Device Hybrid Apps using C#.
HTML/JavaScript (Apache Cordova)
Core Tools for Apache Cordova.
Microsoft Web Developer Tools
Tools for Cloud, Web, Mobile Web and APIs: ASP.NET, IIS Express, HTML5/CSS3 editors, Grunt/Bower client side tools and more.
Microsoft Office Developer Tools
Microsoft Office Developer Tools are add-on tools that enables developers to create, build, debug, run and publish apps and solutions for Office and Sharepoint 2013.
LightSwitch
LightSwitch for Visual Studio is a simplified self-service development tool that enables you to build business applications quickly and easily for the desktop and cloud.
Microsoft Foundation Classes for C++
Microsoft Foundation Class (MFC) libraries for use with Visual C++.
Silverlight Development Kit
Includes SDK needed for developing Silverlight 5 based applications.
Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools

Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools provides the latest tools developers need to build Microsoft SQL Server based applications or Entity Framework based applications. These tools include: * Entity Framework Designer * Microsoft SQL Server Data Tools * Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Native Client * Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Command Line Utilities * Microsoft SQL Server 2012 Transact-SQL Compiler
Blend for Visual Studio
Blend for Visual Studio includes powerful, design-centric tools for XAML and HTML.
Tools for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1

Tools for creating Windows Store apps and games for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1. Includes the Windows SDKs for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.1, and the Visual Studio 2013 Visual C++ toolset (v120).
Emulators for Windows Phone 8.1
The Windows Phone 8.1 emulators help you create and test apps and games for Windows Phone 8.1 without using a device.
Tools for Windows 8.1 and Windows Phone 8.0/8.1
Development tools for creating apps for Windows 8.1, Windows Phone 8.0, and Windows Phone 8.1.
Windows Phone 8.0 SDK
Tools for creating apps and games for Windows Phone 8.0. Includes the Windows SDK for Windows Phone 8.0, the Windows Phone 8.0 emulators, and the Visual Studio 2012 Visual C++ toolset (v110).
Multi-Device Hybrid Apps using HTML and JavaScript
Provides you with the tools to develop 3rd party tools using HTML and JaveScript.
Visual C++ for Cross Platform Mobile Development.
Provides you with the tools to develop 3rd party tools using C++.
Multi-Device Hybrid Apps using C#
Provides you with the tools to develop 3rd party tools using C#.

generichelpmessage.text:
This setup supports the following switches:
/Help Display this usage text. /H /?
/Quiet Quiet mode with no display and no user interaction. /Q /Silent /S
/Passive Display progress but do not wait for user input.
/PromptRestart Prompt the user before restarting the system.
/NoRestart Do not restart during or after installation.
/ForceRestart Always restart the system after installation.
/Log <filename> Specifies a location for the log file. /L
/Uninstall Uninstall the product. /U
/Uninstall /Force Uninstall the product and features shared with other products. /U /Force Warning: using this switch may cause other products installed on this machine to stop functioning properly.
/Repair Repair the product.
/Layout Create a copy of the media in specified folder.
/NoRefresh Prevent setup checking for updates from the internet.
/NoWeb Prevent setup downloading from the internet.
/Full Install all product features.
/FullDynamic Install all dynamic product features.
/AdminFile <filename> Specifies the installation control file.
/AddRemoveFeatures Choose which features to add or remove from the installed product.
/SecondaryInstaller Trigger the secondary installer for Cross Platform Mobile Development at the end of the Visual Studio install if Cross Platform Mobile Development item(s) are selected
/InstallSelectableItems <item1;item2;...;itemN> Choose which selectable item(s) to be installed. If you do not want any selectable item to be installed, just pass in this switch without any value.
/CustomInstallPath <path> Set Custom install location
/ProductKey <25-character product key> Set custom product key (no dashes)
For more information see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=[[HelpFwlinkId]]&clcid=[[clcid]]
